trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> class is a read/write collection that contains <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: La clase <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> es una colección de lectura o escritura que contiene objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to append to this collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a anexar a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Anexa el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object that is appended to this collection.
trans-unit.target: El índice de base cero del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se anexa a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The object already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto ya existe en la colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="link" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="link" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: Appends a range of items to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Anexa un intervalo de elementos a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> array that contains the objects to append to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matriz de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que contiene los objetos que se van a anexar a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Appends the contents of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> array to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Anexa el contenido de la matriz de <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificada a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The object already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto ya existe en la colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="links" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="links" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> object that contains the objects to append to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> que contiene los objetos que se van a anexar a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Appends the contents of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> object to this collection.
trans-unit.target: Anexa el contenido del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLinkCollection" /> especificado a esta colección.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The object already exists in this collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto ya existe en esta colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="links" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="links" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a buscar en esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object is in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina si el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado está en la colección.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object is in this collection; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si esta colección contiene el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" />; en caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="link" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="link" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> array that receives the elements of this collection.
trans-unit.target: Matriz <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que recibe los elementos de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in <c>array</c> where this method starts copying this collection.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero de <c>array</c> donde este método comienza a copiar esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Copies all <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> objects in this collection to the specified array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos los objetos <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> de esta colección en la matriz especificada, empezando por el índice especificado de la matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The destination array is not large enough, based on the source collection size and the <paramref name="index" /> specified.
trans-unit.target: La matriz de destino no es suficientemente grande, tomando como base el tamaño de la colección de origen y el <paramref name="index" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="array" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="array" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of the destination array.
trans-unit.target: El <paramref name="index" /> especificado está fuera del intervalo de la matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to search for in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a buscar en esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Returns the index of the first occurrence of the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve el índice de la primera aparición del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado en esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first matching object.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero del primer objeto coincidente.

trans-unit.source: Returns -1 if no member of this collection is identical to the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve -1 si ningún miembro de esta colección es idéntico al objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="link" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="link" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in this collection where the object is inserted.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero de esta colección donde se inserta el objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to insert into this collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a insertar en esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object into this collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Inserta el objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado en el índice especificado de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The object already exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto ya existe en la colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="link" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="link" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of the collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <paramref name="index" /> especificado está fuera del intervalo de la colección.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to get or set.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero del objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a obtener o establecer.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object in this collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object that exists at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que existe en el índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The member already exists in this collection (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: El miembro ya existe en esta colección (sólo se aplica para establecer).

trans-unit.source: The item specified is <see langword="null" /> (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: El elemento especificado es <see langword="null" /> (sólo se aplica al establecimiento).

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="index" /> specified is out of range of this collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <paramref name="index" /> especificado está fuera del rango de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> specified has not yet been saved to the Active Directory Domain Services store (applies to set only).
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory (se aplica sólo al conjunto).

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the element was inserted.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero donde se ha insertado el elemento.

trans-unit.source: The new value of the element at <c>index</c>.
trans-unit.target: Nuevo valor del elemento situado en <c>index</c>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnClearComplete" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the element was removed.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero de donde se ha quitado el elemento.

trans-unit.source: The element that was removed from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Elemento que se ha quitado de la colección.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnRemoveComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnRemoveComplete(System.Int32,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the set operation occurred.
trans-unit.target: Índice de base cero donde se ha producido la operación Set.

trans-unit.source: The element that was replaced by <c>newValue</c>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento que ha sido reemplazado por <c>newValue</c>.

trans-unit.source: The element that replaced <c>oldValue</c>.
trans-unit.target: Elemento que ha reemplazado <c>oldValue</c>.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnSetComplete(System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnSetComplete(System.Int32,System.Object,System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: The element in this collection to validate.
trans-unit.target: Elemento de esta colección que se va a validar.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnValidate(System.Object)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: Reemplaza el método <see cref="M:System.Collections.CollectionBase.OnValidate(System.Object)" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not an <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> no es un objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object to remove from this collection.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> que se va a quitar de esta colección.

trans-unit.source: Removes the first occurrence of an object in this collection that is identical to the specified <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Quita la primera aparición de un objeto de esta colección que sea idéntico al objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: Una llamada al servicio de directorio subyacente generó un error.

trans-unit.source: The object does not exist in the collection.
trans-unit.target: El objeto no existe en la colección.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="link" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="link" /> es <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> object has not yet been saved in the Active Directory Domain Services store.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectorySiteLink" /> aún no se ha guardado en el almacén de Servicios de dominio de Active Directory.
